label: [eventhandler] static handler with arguments
info:
## Static Handlers - Arguments

Ensure that the initial argument of the static handler is passed to the event handler.

code:
-module(echo_event_handler_9233d5c36c85713f).

%%
%% APIs https://www.erlang.org/doc/apps/stdlib/gen_event.html
%%

-behaviour(gen_event).

-export([
    init/1,
    handle_event/2,
    handle_call/2,
    handle_info/2,
    terminate/2,
    code_change/3
]).

-import(ered_nodes, [
    send_msg_to_connected_nodes/2
]).

init(Args) ->
    {ok, Args}.

handle_event({<<"send_initial_value">>, Msg, EventHandlerNodeDef}, State) ->

    Msg2 = Msg#{ 
        <<"initial_value">> => State
    },

    send_msg_to_connected_nodes(EventHandlerNodeDef, Msg2),

    {ok, State};

handle_event(_Event, State) ->
    {ok, State}.

handle_call(_Request, State) ->
    {ok, ok, State}.

handle_info(_Info, State) ->
    {ok, State}.

terminate(_Reason, _State) ->
    ok.

code_change(_OldVsn, State, _Extra) ->
    {ok, State}.
